model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGame

    public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
implements IGame
    This class old the actual game field and the old constellation of the game field. Furthermore hold it the current game state.
    Author:
    Bj√∂rn Hullmann
